merchant-of-record.title: What is a Merchant of Record and what is it for?
merchant-of-record.description: Discover what a Merchant of Record is and how it can help you in your international expansion. Learn about its benefits and how to implement it.

content.intro: In international commerce, managing sales across multiple countries can be complex. This is where a Merchant of Record (MoR) comes in.

sections.title: What is a Merchant of Record?
sections.content:
A Merchant of Record (MoR) is a legal entity that assumes complete responsibility for the sale to the end customer. This includes:

- Payment processing
- Tax management
- Regulatory compliance
- Legal liability

In other words, the MoR acts as the official seller to your international customers, while you focus on growing your business.

sections.title: Why do you need a Merchant of Record?
sections.content:
Selling internationally involves multiple challenges:

1. Different regulations by country
2. Various tax systems
3. Variety of payment methods
4. Local compliance requirements

An MoR handles all these aspects, significantly simplifying your international expansion.

sections.title: Key Benefits
sections.content:
1. International tax management
- Automatic tax calculation by country
- Tax remittance to relevant authorities
- Complete tax documentation

2. Regulatory compliance
- Adaptation to local regulations
- Management of permits and licenses
- Protection against legal risks

3. Payment processing
- Multiple currency acceptance
- Integration with local payment methods
- Returns and refunds management

sections.title: How to implement an MoR?
sections.content:
Implementing an MoR can be done in several steps:

1. Needs assessment
- Identify your target markets
- Analyze specific requirements
- Define expected sales volume

2. Provider selection
- Compare available options
- Verify geographical coverage
- Evaluate costs and commissions

3. Integration
- Set up your online store
- Connect payment systems
- Conduct transaction tests

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content:
A Merchant of Record is a fundamental tool for any business looking to expand internationally. It not only simplifies operations but also reduces risks and accelerates your entry into new markets.

At Exbordia, we help you connect with the best MoRs for your business, ensuring hassle-free international expansion.
